explains: v. 要求归还；利用，改造（荒地）；回收（废品中有用的东西）；感化，使纠正

sentences.en: The good news for the industry was that investors don't seem to be in any hurry to reclaim their money.
sentences.cn: 对该行业来说，好消息是投资者们似乎不急于要求收回他们的钱。

sentences.en: The richest merchants in Amsterdam contributed money to reclaim a good 7,100 hectares of land.
sentences.cn: 阿姆斯特丹最富有的商人们捐钱并开垦了7100公顷的良田。

sentences.en: Luke and Vlad followed the signs to baggage reclaim.
sentences.cn: 路克和微拉德沿着指示牌到行李提取处。
